title: Pair of Eyeballs
summaries: The Pair of Eyeballs is a pet-summoning item dropped by The Twins in Master Mode with a 25*1/4 (25%) chance. It summons Rez and Spaz, miniature versions of the The Twins in their first form.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons miniature mechanical eyes
'Two are better than one.'
statistics.Sell: 5
